event.event-label: Cisco UCM-defined syslog event: DRF SFTP operation failed
event.descr:
A DRF SFTP operation has failed.
Reason: %parm[ucmReason]%
AppID: %parm[ucmAppID]%
ClusterId: %parm[ucmClusterID]%
NodeID: %parm[ucmNodeID]%
event.logmsg: A DRF STFP operation failed in UCM application %parm[ucmAppID]% on node %parm[ucmNodeID]% in cluster %parm[ucmClusterID]% (OpenNMS node %nodelabel%). The reason provided was: %parm[ucmReason]%.
